pr_title: CB-10242 API changes to support semi-private networks

timeline.message:
CB-10242 API changes to support semi-private networks

Adds new optional fields 'usePublicEndpointAccessGateway' and
'endpointGatewaySubnetIds' to the EnvironmentNetworkV1Request API object. These
fields are persisted to the EnvironmentNetwork and NetworkDto BaseNetwork
objects. Adds new columns for these fields to the environment_network table
and saves them to the database.

Tested with unit tests, and by manually setting the new fields in the IDE and
verifying they were converted/persisted in the database correctly.

timeline.bodyText: Usually, we prefer enums instead of booleans, it makes it easier to extend it the future.
timeline.author: akanto

timeline.bodyText: Can you add more description here, please? What is the purpose of the subnetids?
timeline.author: akanto

replies.bodyText: Added more detail. Please check out the updated descriptions and let me know if they're sufficient.
replies.author: hreeve-cloudera

timeline.author: doktoric

replies.bodyText: I've created an enum PublicEndpointAccessGateway with values ENABLED and DISABLED, and used it in all the objects that have usePublicEndpointAccessGateway.
replies.author: hreeve-cloudera

timeline.bodyText: we can not set nullable = false here
timeline.author: doktoric
doktoric
doktoric
